law.text: All decisions and findings of the commissioner made under the provisions of this subtitle shall be subject to review by proper proceedings in any court of competent jurisdiction in this state.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1405, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 36, effective January 1, 1989.
